text: læa brrda phu thi sraththa læa prakxb sing di ngam thanghlay nan rea ca hı phwk khea khea brrda swn swrrkh sung mi mæna hlay say hil xyu phay tı swn swrrkh hela nan doythi phwk khea ca phanak xyu nı swn swrrkh hela nan tlxd kal pen sayya xan thæcring khx ngxallxhˌ læa khır lea thi mi kha phud cring ying pi kwa xallxhˌ
